memberdef.argsstring: (self, str text="", int x=0, int y=0, int width=200, int height=50)
memberdef.name: __init__

para.verbatim: Draw the button and its components.
Update the button and its components.
Return whether the user's mouse cursor is hovering over the button or not.
Center the button horizontally relative to the specified parent, then return the button itself.
Center the button vertically relative to the specified parent, then return the button itself.

memberdef.argsstring: (self, int parent_x, int parent_y, int parent_width, int parent_height)
memberdef.name: center

para.verbatim: Center the button on both axes relative to the specified parent, then return the button itself.

memberdef.argsstring: (self, int parent_x, int parent_y, int parent_width, int parent_height, int x, int y)
memberdef.name: center_with_offset

para.verbatim: Center the button with center() and offset it by x and y relative to the specified parent, then return the button itself.
Set the width of the button, then return the button itself.
Return the width of the button.
Set the height of the button, then return the button itself.
Return the height of the button.
Set the background colour of the button, then return the button itself.
Return the background colour of the button.
